title: 84/88/EEC: Council Decision of 6 February 1984 authorizing extension or tacit renewal of certain Trade Agreements concluded between the Member States and third countries
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 6 February 1984
authorizing extension or tacit renewal of certain Trade Agreements concluded between the Member States and third countries
(84/88/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Trade Agreements and Protocols concluded between Member States and third countries listed in the Annex hereto may be extended or tacitly renewed, up to the dates indicated for each of them, for those areas not covered by Agreements between the Community and the third countries concerned and in so far as their provisions are not contrary to existing common policies.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 February 1984.
For the Council
The President
M. ROCARD
